item.description:
There are a lot of good movies to choose from this weekend with the HIFF going on but I'm in the mood for a good laugh and I hear this is a funny one.

The movie time is 6:50 but let's meet in the lobby no later than 6:35.

Zack and Miri Make a Porno

Kevin Smith writes and directs his newest comedy for The Weinstein Co. with Zack & Miri Make a Porno, the story of two friends (Seth Rogan and Elizabeth Banks) who get into the amateur porn business to combat their rising debt, only to realize their underlying feelings for each other while doing so.


Reviews:

"... funny concept whose execution does not live up to its potential."
USA Today

- Claudia Puig

"It would be too much to say that what Smith has come up with here is inspired, but it is pretty funny and very energetic."
Variety

- Todd McCarthy


I can't meet for dinner before the movie, but if anyone wants to grab a bite or a drink after the movie, I'm in.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby no later than 6:35.
item.name: Zack and Miri Make a Porno
